author: Ripper36
title: Nice hotel, Great locatio
text:
I stayed here with my family prior to going to Disneyland Paris on Eurostar. The location is ideal for St Pancreas , all be it if you have luggage I would advise getting on the 205 bus and travelling the couple of stops rather than walking uphill for just over a mile.
The staff were extremely helpful and nothing appeared to be any bother.
Nice room, with good facilities and comfortable beds. It was nice to have a proper bed for my little boy , rather than a sofa bed.
We ate from the bar menu in the evening as the main restaurant was a bit to intimate for my 6 year old and we didn't want to disrupt the couples who were having a romantic evening.
The menu choice was good and the food was tastey and well priced for London.
I would use this hotel again.
